alert.note: Alert for South Lincoln County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 05 at 9:14PM MST until January 06 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow, heavy at times, will continue through Thursday. Snow amounts of 8 to 10 inches have fallen near Cokeville. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches are possible. Wind gusts of 25 to 35 mph will continue in open areas, leading to blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...South Lincoln County. This includes US Hwy 30 between Kemmerer and Cokeville. * WHEN...Until 11 PM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult. Blowing snow is likely to significantly reduce visibility down to a quarter of a mile at times.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, water, and a charger for your cell phone in case of an emergency. Call 5 1 1, to get the latest road conditions.
